title: How to Join a Kahoot Game

steps.title: Go to kahoot.it.
steps.content: Go to kahoot.it. Enter the pin displayed on the host's screen.

steps.title: Think of a nickname.
steps.content: Think of a nickname. Enter it into the box. Make sure your host is okay with the nickname you choose â€” some hosts, especially teachers, prefer everyone to use their real names.

steps.title: Change your avatar if you don't like it.
steps.content: Change your avatar if you don't like it. Wait until the game starts before continuing on to the next step.

steps.title: Select the answer that you think is correct.
steps.content: Select the answer that you think is correct. The faster you answer, the more points you'll get if you're correct! Make sure to read the question and answers fully, though, or you may select the wrong one and end up with no points.

steps.title: Keep answering questions until the game ends, after you answer, you can see your points.
steps.content: Keep answering questions until the game ends, after you answer, you can see your points.

steps.title: Keep answering questions until the game ends.
steps.content: Keep answering questions until the game ends. Then, look at the host's screen to see who won the Kahoot. There is a podium that displays the top three players, so it's pretty awesome to be on the podium!
